extendedInfo.description: Free MSN Messenger / Windows Live Messenger! Chat for free with all your Windows Live / MSN messenger buddies with BeejiveIM for Live Messenger! Free! See what reviewers are saying:"Beejive was already our IM client of choice... Background notifications really just sealed the deal, and anything else theyâve added was just frosting on the already delicious cake."Â -- TechCrunchÂ "Overall, after testing various IM apps, Beejive is by far my favorite. The interface is slick and beautiful."Â -- WiredÂ "BeejiveIM is an incredibly full-featured IM client, boasting capabilities that almost put it on par with desktop IM clients."Â -- MacworldÂ "Beejive IM is one of those mobile multi-network chat clients that's a joy to use--it's fast, graphically rich, and just works."Â -- CNETÂ Key Instant Messaging Features:* Save Money: Chat with your MSN friends using your existing data plan, no per-message charges. * Reliable and Efficient: Be connected 24/7 and it's gentle on your battery. * Push Notifications: Be connected even after you close the app. Get notified instantly when you get a new message (requires OS 2.2+). * Stay Connected: Works with multiple MSN / Windows Live Messenger accounts. * Share Files: Send and receive files, including pictures and voice notes.* Universal Interface: Optimized for both tablets and phones.* Highly Customizable: Choose your color theme, chat wallpaper, buddy list styles, and more!* No Sign-Up Required: Just sign in with your existing IM accounts, no need to sign up for anything!Chatting Features: * Real-time Chats: Quickly switch between multiple simultaneous chats. * Group Chats: Chat with multiple buddies in one conversation.* Full Unicode Support: Chat in any language supported by your Android device. * Landscape Option: Type with a larger keyboard. * Save Chats: Email your chats to save your chat history. * Hyperlink Support: Automatically parses links for web pages, YouTube videos, email addresses, twitter usernames, and phone numbers. * Emoticons Support. Account & Buddy Features:  * Full Featured Buddy List: Sort, group, and easily search through your buddy list.  * Buddy Pounce: Receive an alert when your friends come online.* Manage Your Buddies: Including support for add/remove, nicknames, groups, block, and approve/deny requests. * Control Your Availability: Set auto-away and custom status messages, be invisible, change privacy controls. * Configurable Alerts: Customizable sound and vibrate settings. * Buddy Icons: View your friends' icons, set your own.BeejiveIM for Windows Live Messenger lets you chat on Microsoft's chat network on the go with the proven reliability of BeejiveIM. Beejive's reliable and efficient networking has been tested and proven on multiple platforms and is available in a dedicated Android app just for Microsoft's Windows Live messenger service. Move from cellular and wifi connections seamlessly. Stay connected after you close the application and be notified when you get a new message through push notifications (OS 2.2+). After being out of coverage BeejiveIM automatically reconnects and picks up where you left off.* Windows Live Messenger / MSN Messenger and logo are registered trademarks of Microsoft Inc. * BeejiveIM for Windows Live Messenger is not affiliated with nor sponsored by Microsoft Inc.

reviews.title: Finally a solid MSN client
reviews.comment: Works as you expect it to.  Stays logged in and stable; easy to use.
reviews.author: Brad Weldon

reviews.title: Everytime I use it....
reviews.comment: Everytime I use this app it works, and it never lets me down. I\'ve tried many other live Messenger apps but this one is the only one that works as it should, great job! Runs properly in background too. I\'m using samsungs galaxy s III with jellybean 4.1.1 MucH Thanx!
reviews.author: Ryan Smith

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Won\'t connect to my messenger account anymore. Skype or Im+ will work. Very disappointed. Have used beejive for years.
reviews.author: Spiro Taktikos

reviews.title: Best msn client.
reviews.comment: For security !!.I want the app ask for password everytime i start..this app save password.    :-(

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Works better than other messengers out there
reviews.author: Sylvio Thebeau

reviews.title: Droid RAZR
reviews.comment: Works great! I\'ve tried 3 other MSN messenger apps but this one is the best by far. Only drawback for me is that i can\'t change profile picture. i can go through the motions but it doesn\'t save. Says \"internal server error\"
reviews.author: Sarah Woll

reviews.title: Bad pic downloads
reviews.comment: Broken Picture files on ever downloaded sent by a user. The rest of the program is fine.
reviews.author: Jorge Cobos

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Not bad but connection not direct, login and tranfered data established on the beejive servers, this is big security issue. Sorry this software not real messenger client.
